input.sentences: last weekend me and my best friend [male] went skiing .
we enjoyed our time talking | smiling | and taking selfies .
i even tried snowboarding | but spent must of my time falling down .
me and [male] also trekked the grounds and observed the mountains surrounding us .
to end the day we ate a wonderful meal of meatloaf | mash potatoes and corn .
output.sentences: Hans got ready for his wintry fun in the mountains.
His friend Rudy met him there.
But Hans and company fared well in the stunning mountain terrain..
That evening Hans and Rudy relaxed at the lodge bar.
